name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: inDoors - Show Glassdoor ratings on job sites

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows Glassdoor ratings for companies when searching on Linkedin, Indeed, and Handshake.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clicking on the rating opens up the reviews page for the company or the search results page if the company is not found. Hovering over the rating brings up a tooltip with the company's website and industry name. Rating data is cached for a month. Note that the fewer reviews a company has, the less likely Glassdoor will correctly find it.

The Github repo for this extension is here: https://github.com/CalvinWu4/inDoors
Please file an issue there if the extension no longer works properly on a website instead of leaving a bad rating.
